Award Description: The principle objective of this project is carry out concrete testing works to Tyne Tunnel East and West bridges and Coatham Interchange North and South bridges as outlined in the Works Information and accompanying specifications and testing drawings.

Highways England is looking for the provision of technical support services to provide technical assurance and advice, including the review of Departures from Standards and applications for non-prescribed traffic signs Authorisations. 

The Safer Roads Design (SRD) team provides advice, technical assurance and governance, covering road geometry, traffic signs and road markings and traffic sign/signal gantry positioning, to scheme project managers and designers for all types of Highways England road projects.  The team also provides recommendations on departures from standards and reviews applications for non-prescribed traffic signs prior to submission to the Department for Transport (DfT) for authorisation by the Secretary of State for Transport. 
Due to the limited availability of specialist resources in the SRD team, there is a need for additional specialist professional engineering resource to assist in the delivery of this varied workload through three discrete sub-tasks.

Supplier Address - street address: Socotec House, Bretby Business Park, Burton Upon Trent, DE15 0YZ
Award Description: Asbestos Refurbishment Surveys, Asbestos Management Surveys and Depot Re-inspection Surveys.

Highways England is looking to set up a Task to deliver technical and project management to the winning bids for the air quality innovation call.  The Task will also support programme management of the Air Quality Designated Fund as it is transitioned into the Environment & Wellbeing Fund for this second Road Investment Period.

The aim of this contract is to support Highways England: 

-	To deliver technical and project management to the projects that were winners of the Air Quality Innovation Call through to their completion planned for August 2020.
-	To transition management of the air quality designated fund to internal resource in the Designated Funds Programme Management Office
-	To support the establishment of the Air Quality Leadership Group and the transition of pollution climate mapping (PCM) link mitigation reporting to Operations colleagues on that Group.  Such activity supporting Government's National Air Quality Plan is reported monthly to the Office of Road & Rail (ORR).

Award Title: Area 4 Asset Delivery Construction Works Framework (Area 4 Interim) Contract
Award Description:
The requirement is to engage a contractor to undertake works within the Highways England South-East region and specifically within Area 4.

This will include but not limited to - Road lighting & electrical; Roads Pavement; General Civil Engineering, Geotechnical and Drainage; Technology; Landscaping & Ecology; Road marking & studs; Road restraint systems & fencing; Temporary traffic management; Structures, structural services, and Expansion joints; and any other similar duties.
